external_references.description: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems. (2016, March 18). Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case. Retrieved March 27, 2018.

objects.description: During the [2015 Ukraine Electric Power Attack](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0028), power company phone line operators were hit with a denial of service attack so that they couldn’t field customers’ calls about outages. Operators were also denied service to their downstream devices when their serial-to-ethernet converters had their firmware overwritten, which bricked the devices. (Citation: Ukraine15 - EISAC - 201603)
